metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26661 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An XXE issue was discovered in Tryton Application Platform (Server) 5.xthrough 5.0.45, 6.x through 6.0.15, and 6.1.x and 6.2.x through 6.2.5, andTryton Application Platform (Command Line Client (proteus)) 5.x through5.0.11, 6.x through 6.0.4, and 6.1.x and 6.2.x through 6.2.1. Anauthenticated user can make the server parse a crafted XML SEPA file toaccess arbitrary files on the system.

criterions.comment: tryton-proteus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
tryton-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
